verb.definition: To form a mental image of something; to imagine or picture something in the mind
verb.example: She tried to visualize the scene he was describing.

noun.definition: The act or process of forming a mental image or representation of something
noun.example: Her visualization of the project helped the team understand the plan clearly.

usage_examples: Before you swing, visualize yourself hitting the ball.
Visualization is a powerful technique for achieving goals.
